explanation_templates.stream_explanation: After Class 10, students can choose from {{stream_name}} stream. This stream typically leads to {{career_options}}. The key subjects are {{subjects}}.
explanation_templates.variant_explanation: {{variant_name}} is a variant of the {{stream_name}} stream that focuses on {{subject_focus}}. This variant prepares students for {{eligible_exams}} and leads to {{career_paths}}.
explanation_templates.exam_explanation: {{exam_name}} is an entrance exam required for {{degree_or_course}}. It specifically tests your {{subject_areas}} knowledge. You need to have {{stream_variants}} background to be eligible.
explanation_templates.degree_explanation: {{degree_name}} is a {{duration}}-year program typically undertaken after {{stream_or_exam}}. Graduates from this program pursue careers in {{career_areas}}.
explanation_templates.career_explanation: A {{career_name}} is a professional pursuing {{field_description}}. This typically comes after completing {{degree_or_course}}. The key skills required are {{skills}}.
explanation_templates.path_explanation: To become a {{career_name}}, you can follow this path: Class 10 → {{stream}} → {{exam}} → {{degree}} → {{career}}. Each step typically takes {{duration}}.
explanation_templates.interest_match: You mentioned interest in {{interest}}. This typically aligns well with careers like {{matched_careers}} because {{reason}}.
explanation_templates.skill_development: During your {{degree}}, you'll develop skills in {{skill_list}}. These skills will help you in pursuing {{career_paths}}.
explanation_templates.lateral_move_explanation: After completing {{current_degree}}, you can laterally transition to {{alternative_path}} by taking {{exam_or_exam}}. This opens opportunities in {{new_careers}}.
explanation_templates.warning_not_eligible: Note: {{stream}} students typically cannot directly pursue {{restricted_path}} because of eligibility requirements. However, you may consider {{alternative_path}} instead.
explanation_templates.encouragement: Your interests in {{interests}} and emerging skills in {{skills}} make you a good fit for {{career_path}}. The path involves {{steps_summary}}.
explanation_templates.exploration_prompt: Curious about {{career}}? This career requires {{requirements}} and typically earns you skills in {{skills}}. Would you like to explore this path further?

rules_for_explanations.never_guarantee: Never say 'you will definitely' - always use 'typically' or 'can lead to'
rules_for_explanations.always_mention_alternatives: Always present 2-3 alternative paths when possible
rules_for_explanations.be_encouraging: Frame careers positively without dismissing other options
rules_for_explanations.acknowledge_difficulty: Be honest about competitive exams and effort required
rules_for_explanations.include_timelines: Always mention duration of studies where applicable
rules_for_explanations.cite_source: All factual claims should reference official sources (UGC, NTA, etc)
rules_for_explanations.no_salary_discussion: Never mention salary or income expectations in explanations
